Summary: Very bright fast flashing light over lake Erie 9pm
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There were no other sightings in Buffalo on or around April 17th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsLow flying and short sighting off hamburg beach NY about 10 quick bright flashes, almost looked like fireworks towards Buffalo. at first we figured it had something to do with the saber game but they lost:( This was definitely not a plane or firework!
